Summary: A huge, bright reddish orb zoomed across the sky at the speed of light and left a blurry trail.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside by a campfire and watching the stars. It looked like a falling star but was much larger and bright red- it also left a fuzzy trail. The event left us mystified- we lost sight when it fell.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kailua
There were no other sightings in Kailua on or around May 28th 2012
